Dr. Islam is a Member of the American Academy of Neurology (AAN) and the American College of Physicians (MACP). He specializes in diagnosing and treating neurological disorders such as stroke, epilepsy, migraine, headache, Parkinson’s disease, dementia, nerve pain, neuropathy, vertigo, brain infections, and nutritional neurological disorders. Dr. Rafiqul Islam is an Associate Professor of Neuromedicine at the National Institute of Neurosciences & Hospital.
